content.text: Mr. O'Malley, is a fictional character played by R.F. Daley in the television series The Office.

In Sexual Harassment, Jan brings Mr. O'Malley to Scranton as part of the branch's sexual harassment training. Michael assumes that he's in trouble and retains his own attorney, James P. Albini, unaware that Mr. O'Malley is on retainer to protect the company and upper management, which includes Michael.
